quote: You have to believe in yourself when no one else does.
author: Serena Williams

quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come without leaving happier.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: You've got to be in it to win it.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Find out who you are and do it on purpose.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: For me, becoming isn't about arriving somewhere or achieving a certain aim. I see it instead as forward motion, a means of evolving, a way to reach continuously toward a better self. The journey doesn't end.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Confident people have a way of carrying themselves that makes others attracted to them.
author: Sofia Vergara

quote: If you can do what you do best and be happy, you are further along in life than most people.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: You can be everything. You can be the infinite amount of things that people are.
author: Kesha

quote: Always go with your passions. Never ask yourself if it's realistic or not
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: When you change your thoughts, remember to also change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: The more you know who you are, and what you want, the less you let things upset you.
author: Stephanie Perkins

quote: By being yourself, you put something wonderful in the world that was not there before.
author: Edwin Elliot

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Elliot

quote: Find out who you are and be that person. That's what your soul was put on this earth to be. Find the truth, live that truth, and everything else will come.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: It goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: You can't help what you feel, but you can help how you behave.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: No need to hurry. No need to sparkle. No need to be anybody but oneself.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: A. A. Milne

quote: Failure is a great teacher and, if you are open to it, every mistake has a lesson to offer.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Be persistent and never give up hope.
author: George Lucas

quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: There are so many great things in life; why dwell on negativity?
author: Zendaya

quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
author: John Barrymore

quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: Keep your face towards the sunshine and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
author: Duke Ellington

quote: You don't always need a plan. Sometimes you just need to breathe, trust, let go and see what happens.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible!'
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Life does not have to be perfect to be wonderful.
author: Annette Funicello

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle

quote: The best way out is through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Whether you think you can or you can't, you're right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Don't take yourself too seriously. Know when to laugh at yourself, and find a way to laugh at obstacles that inevitably present themselves.
author: Halle Bailey

quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
author: Bob Marley

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I'm not going to continue knocking that old door that doesn't open for me. I'm going to create my own door and walk through that.
author: Ava DuVernay

quote: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: I believe that if you'll just stand up and go, life will open up for you. Something just motivates you to keep moving.
author: Tina Turner

quote: Once you face your fear, nothing is ever as hard as you think.
author: Olivia Newton-John

quote: Next time, ask 'What's the worst that will happen?' Then push yourself a little further than you dare.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: Dreams do not come true just because you dream them. It's hard work that makes things happen. It's hard work that creates change.
author: Shonda Rhimes

quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Take the time to enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
author: Robert Brault

quote: The future is not something we enter. The future is something we create.
author: Leonard I. Sweet

quote: Life has got those twists and turns. You've got to hold on tight and off you go.
author: Nicole Kidman

quote: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Don't wait around for other people to be happy for you. Any happiness you get you've got to make yourself.
author: Alice Walker

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: You define your own life. Don't let other people write your script.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Mistakes are a fact of life. It is the response to the error that counts.
author: Nikki Giovanni

quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Ignore your mistakes. The number one thing to worry about is: Am I doing what I'm good at?
author: Max Levchin

quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.
author: Les Brown

quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: We become what we think about most of the time.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Life is very interesting…in the end, some of your greatest pains become your greatest strengths.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Life is a daring adventure or it is nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

quote: All dreams are within reach. All you have to do is keep moving towards them.
author: Viola Davis

quote: Life is made of ever so many partings welded together.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: My interest is in the future because I am going to spend the rest of my life there.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: Life is what happens to you when you are busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: Yesterday is but today's memory and tomorrow is today's dream.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: It's amazing how a little tomorrow can make up for a whole lot of yesterday.
author: John Guare

quote: Success is falling nine times and getting up 10.
author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: If you don't have any shadows you're not in the light.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: There are no regrets in life. Just lessons.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
author: Henry Ford

quote: If you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it.
author: Margaret Fuller

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: How dare you settle for less when the world made it so easy for you to be remarkable?
author: Seth Godin

quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
author: Joshua J. Marine

quote: We cannot solve problems with the kind of thinking we employed when we came up with them.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: It's always better to shock people and change people's expectations than to give them exactly what they think you can do.
author: Jonah Hill

quote: And when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you achieve it.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Don't worry about failure, you only have to be right once.
author: Drew Houston

quote: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterwards.
author: Vernon Sanders Law

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: For the great doesn't happen through impulse alone, and is a succession of little things that are brought together
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Success does not happen overnight. Keep your eye on the prize and don't look back.
author: Erin Andrews

quote: It's a good place when all you have is hope and not expectations.
author: Danny Boyle

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person.
author: Bill Clinton

quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone, and a funnybone.
author: Reba McEntire

quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need.
author: Vernon Howard

quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Living might mean taking chances, but they're worth taking
author: Lee Ann Womack

quote: The simple things are also the most extraordinary things, and only the wise can see them.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: There is no perfection, only life.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: I go to seek a Great Perhaps.
author: François Rabelais

quote: My wish for you is that you continue. Continue to be who you are, to astonish a mean world with your acts of kindness.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The art of life is to know how to enjoy a little and to endure very much.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

quote: There is no passion to be found playing small—in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: The great courageous act that we must all do is to have the courage to step out of our history and past so that we can live our dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: We are here to add what we can to life, not to get what we can from life.
author: William Osler

quote: Be where you are; otherwise you will miss your life.
author: Buddha

quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
author: Robert Byrne

quote: We pass through this world but once.
author: Stephen Jay Gould

quote: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: One of the deep secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others.
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: Life is tough my darling, but so are you.
author: Stephanie Bennett Henry

quote: There's love enough in this world for everybody, if people will just look.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Whatever we are, whatever we make of ourselves, is all we will ever have—and that, in its profound simplicity, is the meaning of life.
author: Philip Appleman

quote: In the long run, the sharpest weapon of all is a kind and gentle spirit.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Living an experience, a particular fate, is accepting it fully.
author: Albert Camus

quote: So, what if, instead of thinking about solving your whole life, you just think about adding additional good things. One at a time. Just let your pile of good things grow
author: Rainbow Rowell

quote: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass, it's about learning to dance in the rain.
author: Vivian Greene

quote: The new dawn blooms as we free it. For there is always light if only we're brave enough to see it, if only we're brave enough to be it.
author: Amanda Gorman

quote: There is not one big cosmic meaning for all; there is only the meaning we each give to our life, an individual meaning, an individual plot, like an individual novel, a book for each person.
author: Anais Nin

quote: The mystery of life isn't a problem to solve, but a reality to experience.
author: Frank Herbert

quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
author: Oscar Wilde
